snippet: Shares of General Motors jumped on better-than-expected results, but Chipotle Mexican Grill stock tumbled after its results fell short.
abstract: Stocks fall as crude oil prices drop.
lead_paragraph: Shares of General Motors jumped on better-than-expected results, but Chipotle Mexican Grill stock tumbled after its results fell short.

headline.print_headline: Shares Close Down After Late Decline as Crude Prices Fall
headline.main: Late Fade for the Market as Earnings Flow In
